message: Will be interesting to see how they handle an OS throughline, if any
I have no idea what you are talking about. I don't even know if this is a movie or a tv show. Nevertheless, I recorded it and will try to watch it. Went to "The Eagle" tonight.
Way darker than I expected (though I don't know why considering the author!). This story is all about Impact Character Resolve.

It was perfect for what it was, although it grew gradually worse as the movie went on. I give it a five or six, but that was exactly what we needed last night: nothing too complicated. Structurally, it doesn't really conform to a storyform. And it if does, it's not worth figuring out.
@MikeDerk wait, you talkin' about Eagle or Sunset?
Haha, "The Eagle". Haven't had a chance yet to watch Sunset Limited.
